name: Sap Shipping Plugin
author: Strictly Auto Parts

sections.description:
Automate your order fulfillment process by syncing to Strictly Auto Parts’ software.

Features

Fulfillment is simple with Strictly Auto Parts. Reduce the amount of hours you spend shipping your orders. Connect your WooCommerce store and sync orders from your site. Automate your shipping workflows by letting us take it off your hands. Batch shipping allows for almost instant label creation and printing. Get updated order and tracking information on WooCommerce within a matter of seconds. To top it off, make your customers happy with quick tracking information updates for their order as soon as we create a label.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the sap-shipping folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Visit WooCommerce >> Settings >> Advanced >> REST API
  4. Add Key
  5. After generating the keys, you will get the Consumer Key and Consumer Secret Key. Please copy these keys as it will no longer be visible after closing this screen. Once copied, please share the keys with the Strictly Auto Parts Team.
  6. We will need to add the webhook URLs under the “Webhook” tab. Go to WooCommerce >> Settings >> Advanced >> Webhooks
  7. Add webhook
    7.1. Create Order Webhook
    7.2. Update Order Webhook
